entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Norman Wells
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:02 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -21.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Norman Wells Airport 10:40 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -21.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -24.0°C
Wind: WNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the afternoon then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
